text: Melodie Sisk is an Atlanta-based independent film producer and actress known for White Reindeer, The Ladies of the House, Summer of Blood, Little Sister, Social Animals and the upcoming The Death of Dick Long for A24 Films. Sisk was born in Bat Cave, North Carolina but raised mostly in Atlanta. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" |+Key | style="background:#FFFFCC;"| | Denotes films that have not yet been released |} {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
